dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Browallia{/it}) of tropical American herbs of the nightshade family cultivated for their blue, violet, or white flowers

et: New Latin, from J. {it}Browallius{/it} †1755 Swedish naturalist
shortdef: any of a genus (Browallia) of tropical American herbs of the nightshade family cultivated for their blue, violet, or white flowers
